price: Allah yolunda öldürülenlere “Ölüler” demeyin. Onlar, diridirler, fakat siz hissedemezsiniz.
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَن يُقۡتَلُ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتُۢۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٞ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlū liman yuq'talu fī sabīli al-lahi amwātun bal aḥyāon walākin lā tashʿurūna
